title: MONDAY 4/19 - TOM BRADY KNEE UPDATE
itunes:title: MONDAY 4/19 - TOM BRADY KNEE UPDATE
description:
Tom Brady recovering from offseason knee surgery, he gives an update on his health status (0:09). Washington GM Martin Mayhew (0:37) talks about the team's plans on possibly adding a QB in the draft. North Dakota State QB Trey Lance (1:15) will hold his second pro day today. The Steelers (2:13) looking to add some running back depth in the draft, plus LSU star wideout Ja'Marr Chase (2:25) talks getting advice from a former teammate

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
